sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM t_code2 WHERE code1 = #code1# AND code2 = #code2#
SELECT name2 FROM t_code2 WHERE code1 = #code1# AND code2 = #code2#
SELECT /*+index(t_code1 pk_code1)*/ code1, name1, note, DECODE (status, 'S', '활성', '비활성') status, TO_CHAR (regist_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') regist_date FROM t_code1 WHERE status <> 'D'

SELECT a.code1, b.name1, a.code2, a.name2, a.note, a.rank, DECODE (a.status, 'S', '활성', '비활성') status, TO_CHAR (a.regist_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') regist_date FROM t_code2 a, t_code1 b WHERE a.code1 = b.code1 AND a.code1 = #value# AND a.status = 'S' ORDER BY a.rank
